extractFactDictList.sentence: The song "Now That We Found Love" (also known as "Now That We've Found Love") was originally written by Kenneth Gamble and Leon Huff.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the song first recorded?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It was first recorded by the American R&B/soul vocal group The O'Jays for their seventh album, Ship Ahoy, in Later, it was covered by the reggae band Third World in The song was also covered by the American group Heavy D & the Boyz in 1991, which became a very successful dance/house cover and remains their biggest hit.
